title: Everly
description: After she betrays a powerful mob boss, a woman matches wits and weaponry with a legion of killers who are out to collect the bounty on the heads of her and her family.

reviews.text: Everly takes a little bit from a lot of different action films and adds up to a solid piece of entertainment.  Salma Hayek fits this role well.  There's nothing special or different here, but I was entertained.  B

I watched this movie because it came up on one of those 'good movies you've missed'. Two things wrong with that statement one-I wouldn't have missed in my life and second it isn't good. What a terrible movie nothing really redeeming other than the beautiful Salma Hayek running around in a slip. Even that can't save this crappy movie. Its attempts at being edgy and cleaver come across heavy handed, sophomoric, and idiotic. There's a part for no apparent reason after being raped, beat up and shot she slips on her 4 inch high heel leopard skin pumps just so she can walk around like a stripper for 5 min, idiotic. Mrs. Hayek gets shot, stabbed, punched and doesn't seem to effect her very much if at all. Forget this movie I'm sorry I wasted my time.
Surprisingly entertaining movie. When I start watching I said to myself: if this is where the movie goes, I am gonna like it. At some point, it gets out of the apartment but not of the building.
Awesome movie that is filled with action and suspense... Where is part 2???????????
